instruction: Provide an appropriate response for declining the invitation.
input:
Hi [person name],

I'm writing to ask you if you are happy to be a panelist of our workshop on multimodality at CVPR. The workshop will be held on June 20, 2023. 

Best,
[my name]
output: Thank you so much for considering me as panelist for your upcoming CVPR 2023 workshop on Multimodality. Unfortunately, I will be unavailable on the workshop's dates and must decline the invitation. I wish the workshop all the best.
